EventStory.Headline: Edited Transcript of PMO.L M&A conference call or presentation 17-Dec-20 11:00am GMT
EventStory.Body:
Premier Oil PLC Update On Proposed Merger With Chrysaor And Change Of Name M&A Call
London Dec 17, 2020 (Thomson StreetEvents) -- Edited Transcript of Premier Oil PLC M&A conference call or presentation Thursday, December 17, 2020 at 11:00:00am GMT
TEXT version of Transcript

Event.eventTitle: Premier Oil PLC Update On Proposed Merger With Chrysaor And Change Of Name M&A Call
